item.title: Michigan State Stays Undefeated After Beating UNC in Fort Myers Tip-Off
item.description: No. 11 Michigan State kept rolling in a statement, double-digit win over away No. 16 North Carolina 74-58 in the Fort Myers Tip-Off.

item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Man City to rival Arsenal for rising Spain star Mendoza
item.description: Arsenal may have to compete with Manchester City to sign Elche midfielder Rodrigo Mendoza. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

item.title: Lamar cites consistency amid turnovers, slump
item.description: Ravens QB Lamar Jackson insisted after Thursday's loss to the Bengals there is one solution to get out of his career-worst slump: consistency.
